attributes.title: I am appalled
attributes.review: This has to be the worst app to have ever been downloaded on my phone. Not only did it make my dislike towards our president stronger but I have became even more liberal in my opinions in disagreement to his policies. I hope America can heal from the trauma Donald Trump has inflicted on it.

attributes.title: Will Cause Cancer
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and all my brain cells were fried. The stupidity was too much for my marvelous brain. As soon as I opened it I thought I died because of nasty smell of stupidity traveling across my screen. Please do not download if you want to be a smart person.

attributes.title: Trump👨broke🤬into 👎🏼my 👉house😾!!
attributes.review: I downloaded👾the app 🎂and as soon as it appeared 😬on my screen,😏 I hear a window 😦break!! I go 🚶🏼‍♀️to the window and see 👀non other than mr 👨stinky 👃🏻pants👖 himself (Donald Dump). He then confirmed🖐that he did 🙀take a dump💩 in my yard 🤖and he abuses baren.👿I am very disappointed😿, don’t 🙏download this orange 🤦🏼‍♀️promoting app!🤳🏼

attributes.title: HATE IT
attributes.review: WORST APP EVER. I took hours to download. I was trying to support our president, but thank god I didn’t. When it finally downloaded I tried getting in and it didn’t let me, the screen would go black and then just take me out of the page and close the app. I HATE THIS APP.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This app has many glitches and many ads. Even so, I have been trying to find a reason to somewhat give my support to Trump and the ideals in the app are just immoral and wrong. This is app needs to be rid off, it is not a good app at all.

attributes.title: 1 star
attributes.review: This is an absolutely horrible app, not only is the programming and layout bad but the message itself is bad, spreading hate and bad stuff about other people, it looks like it was created on the oldest windows computer you can find

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The app wouldn’t stop lagging and then it would take me to other sites that are not family friendly and would connect to the speaker and have the videos blasting infront if my family

attributes.title: DONALD TRUMP IS RACIST
attributes.review: Donald Trump tells us that if we don’t like it here go back from where we came from. Donald Trump also don’t wear masks for COVID nor did he tell us the toll of COVID went up and he’s responsible for that because he’s our president so he’s suppose to tell us everything and not keep secrets from us.

attributes.title: I feel attacked
attributes.review: I opened this app expecting to be amazed. But no I wasn’t as soon as I opened it I saw this orange creature. It’s not the first time I have seen it I heard it’s a rapist and racist. Oh... nvm that’s our pathetic president. Still broke my heart💔💋🦨I would love if this app was removed from the planet forever including dolald😌

attributes.title: his plans.
attributes.review: As a fellow gen z member i will not come up here and bash the president of America but instead encourage all of his supporters to get help. He’s racist, homophobic, and misogynistic if you support him then you support his actions and right now all we need in this world is unity. But bunker boy has yet to talk about it. Anyways get help.
